verse: The day came when King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon took Jeconiah (son of Jehoiakim), king of Judah, into exile along with the princes of Judah and the artisans and skilled laborers from Jerusalem. Sometime after they arrived in Babylon, the Eternal showed me a vision: I looked and saw two baskets of figs placed in front of His temple.
One basket was filled with very good figs, freshly ripened, while the other was filled with very bad figs, too rotten to eat.
At this, the word of the Eternal came to me.
